name: Chick List
description:
Solo dev. Made for the (2 Day) GMTK 2021 Game Jam!

- Controls -

WASD - Movement

R - Restart Level

Alt + R - Restart Game

M - Toggle Mute

- Cheats -

Alt + P - Skip level

Alt + Space - Spawn Additional Node

- Credits -

Developed by GryphShot

Most art by GryphShot

Music:

    Realizer by Kevin MacLeod

    Link: filmmusic.io/song/5047-realizer
